#if (BENCHMARK)
    declare_dependency(profiler git@gitlab.com:mxs301/profiler.git)
#ENDIF ()
declare_dependency(ppidd https://gitlab.com/molpro/ppidd.git)
declare_dependency(googletest https://github.com/google/googletest.git)
